channel.title: Comments on: I never wanted to be my own boss
channel.description: I am multiple and various - Tomas A. Krag

item.title: By: medieval fantastique
item.dc:creator: medieval fantastique
item.description: <p>Being my own boss is a dream for me! Think about poeple who have bad boss! They're a lot!</p>
item.content:encoded: Being my own boss is a dream for me! Think about poeple who have bad boss! They’re a lot!

item.title: By: Ricky
item.dc:creator: Ricky
item.description: <p>I think the term 'the grass is always greener' applies. I'm currently in a similar situation. Its good to hear im not the only one who's suffered this fate..</p>
item.content:encoded: I think the term ‘the grass is always greener’ applies. I’m currently in a similar situation. Its good to hear im not the only one who’s suffered this fate..
